question: Collect and represent data to show the incidence, prevalence and mortality rates of a non-infectious disease.

sample_answer.full_answer: Data on the incidence, prevalence, and mortality rates of a non-infectious disease can be collected from a variety of sources, such as government health websites and the World Health Organization (2 marks). This data can then be represented in a variety of ways, such as tables, graphs, and charts (2 marks). For example, a line graph could be used to show the trend in the incidence of a disease over time, while a bar chart could be used to compare the prevalence of a disease in different populations (2 marks).
